post.body: a little vi love: http://is.gd/aa2k
go to www.twitter.com on your computer, sign in, and click on my profile or @Meleah1's profile and follow some of the peeps we are...
let us know if you see any DINOSAURS in Disneyland! ;)
thanks :D
thank you sir. I'd like to thank @ittymonkey for the dinosaur inspiration, and @lobymustard for the motivation and new nick!
IDK, the dude you have from the totally random craigslist used-bicycle posting is pretty 1337. ;)
guilty as charged. Thanks for my new nick' too!
that's hawt. I was checking out the N96 this weekend, but decided my next phone should be a sony: http://tinyurl.com/595b8k
I was with you all the way until the bit about the "otherwise delicious gardenburger". That's just nasty - Sorry bro.
felt like about 19 on my motorcycle, but it was too sunny - I couldn't resist!
what? you didn't stage a pic of you playing chess?
are you listening to some B.Marley while I'm not around? Who are you and what have you done with my wife!?
Mandrew. Powell Butte, 12:30 PM (PST). Be there or be square.
how much longer until you come to the micro-brew capitol of the world for a live diggnation? Portland, OR!
you're missing out bud. One day you'll look back and wish you had started sooner.
just watched "cat elevator" - that was awesome! Lazy cats (and lazy cat owners) FTW!
thank you sir! It's going to be a fun hobby for me...
huh?
what?! That's awesome!
Just saw 2 huge raccoons run across the street at 44th+Belmont. @Meleah1 thinks I'm too much of a city-boy when I point out raccoons
Following a RHD Mini Cooper on Belmont.
I just realized that all I've eaten all day is banana bread and peanut butter fudge - and only about two bites of each. I'm about to crash.
My inbox just saw it's 50th email for the day and it's not even Noon. Ugh.
trying to figure out how to make the sun stand still... There's just not enough time in the day.
Just finished drinks at the Matador, now dinkin around with python for a little bit, then off to bed...
feeling a sense of duty to rep for Mr. Rogers and break out in song "It's a beautiful day in the neigborhood..."
Unboxed my Sony STR-DG920 tonight (so excited!), but alas installation will have to wait until painting is finished in the basement.
</acceptance-speech>
dinorogers; a.k.a. "the artist formerly known as @calebhailey"
see specifically the DLNA sharing (i.e. streaming audio and video from the phone to the PS3). That's the new hotness.
just got home - I logged 70+ miles on my motorcycle today in sub-negro temperatures. I just couldn't resist - it was sooo nice outside.
ooh, google reader got a new interface today... I wonder what other goodies are hidden below the surface?
Retweeting @Veronica: We've all had days like this, I'm sure: http://buzzfeed.com/scott/dumb-dog/
Had to unfollow @MCHammer - the dude is out of control with the @replies. Yo @MCHammer: direct messages are 2 Legit 2 Quit!
I hear bagpipes!?
I just had the worlds best Bisquits & Gravy breakfast at Mothers Bistro in downtown PDX. Is it nap time yet?
Getting ready to go to a friends first public talk! FUN!
Eek! Almost 3:00 AM! Darn you caffiene!
it's crazy how easy it is to setup a website now. It's almost criminal actually.
while I'm on the topic, can I just say how annoying domain-squatters are? Stop buying up randomly awesome domains and ruining my fun!
Buying a domain name on godaddy.com
this is a dose of pure awesomeness - EVERYONE needs to see this: http://i37.tinypic.com/1z48ppk.jpg (from an old ep of diggnation)
Just bought a bottle of French wine called "Fat Bastard". Can't wait to go home and try it out.
wow, it's only 7:00 pm and it's already down to 34 degrees. Now if we could just get some snow!
banging out some painting in the basement (now just waiting for the first coat to dry up)...
USC Missed the FGA! This is awesome!
UCLA FUMBLE RECOVERY AND TOUCHDOWN! Go Bruins!!!!!!!!!!!1!1!!!
Go UCLA!
LOL, the really funny/sad thing about that video is, for a spoof, that was a pretty catchy song! What has happened to my beloved hip hop?
Retweeting @Veronica (again): This video sums up my feelings on Autotune perfectly. http://tinyurl.com/66hoyy HILARIOUS!
I'm on a hot-chocolate high. Darn you Moonstruck Chocolate!
AW MAN! I was planning to do something special for my 1000th twitter post, and I just realized I passed up 1K 14 "tweets" ago... Bummer.
...yes, today is a "whitey" day. I can say that cuz I carry both cards. ;)
eating Pad Thai to the tune of ACDC's "Back in Black" (the album).
IDK why it took me so long, but I just finally figured out a REALLY simply way to stream my home music collection to the office (over DAAP).
ooh, this looks like a promising media server software project: http://www.boxee.tv/
We got close to closing a deal today that will send me to Miami for a week. I'm kinda excited about that...
Chrome 1.0 is out: http://tinyurl.com/6bpabg
wow, the XBMC has come a long way: http://xbmc.org/ ...tempting...
about the start the second of back-to-back software demos. Ugh, I hate these things...
whoa, playstation home is coming today: http://ps3.ign.com/articles/937/937186p1.html
...cuz sometimes 140-characters just aren't enough...
I CAN HAZ MY OWN BLOG?! http://calebhailey.com
This looks like fun: http://www.postcard.fm/
whoa, my company is the victim of a typosquatter! Crazy sauce!
